result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Timothy John Rolow Jr.

records.addlTxt: PL's Exhibit 4, DE's Exhibits D1 - D3 from 9/26/22 Motion Hearing. kma

- AMENDED 

- Bond on file

- Defendant to test at JSC today, 9/26/22, if ETG test is negative, Defendant can turn in SCRAM.

- Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant.

1:05 PM Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: V. Kasten, Clerk: B Harris, Defendant Timothy John Rolow Jr. in court.  Attorney Dan Firkus in court for Timothy John Rolow Jr.  Prosecuting attorney Brian Thomas Smestad in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court reviews file and Motion to Determine number of prior convictions that was filed by Atty Firkus. S/T of DE.  Direct by Atty Firkus. DE's Exhibits D1 and D3, both O/R. Cross by ADA Smestad. State's Exhibit 4- O/R.  Redirect by Atty Firkus.  DE's Exhibit D2- O/R.  ADA Smestad requesting to file brief.  Court requests brief to be filed by 11/7/22, Atty Firkus to have response by 11/21/22,  ADA Smestad to have reply filed by 12/2/22. DE verified address states address will change at the end of the month and phone number.  Bond continues.  DE to provide ETG test and can leave SCRAM unit with JSC if test is negative.  Adjourned at 1:36 AM. bph
Oral ruling scheduled for December 20, 2022 at 04:00 pm.

2:02 PM Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: V. Kasten, Clerk: B Harris, Prosecuting attorney Brian Thomas Smestad in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Timothy John Rolow Jr. in court.  Attorney Dan Firkus in court for Timothy John Rolow Jr. Court reviews file. Atty Firkus makes statements on status of attorney from a prior conviction, asking for more time to do background check.  Court will set this out one more time for a MH. DE verified address and phone number.  Bond continues. Adjourned at 2:06 PM. bph
Motion hearing scheduled for September 26, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Motion hearing on September 26, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Pretrial Bond Report. Filed by JSC. SEALED. km      to rg
Motion hearing on August 4, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

11:13 AM  Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: V. Kasten, Clerk: B Harris, ADA: Michelle P Brekken for ADA: Brian Smestad, DF ATTY: Dan Firkus, DF: Timothy John Rolow appeared via zoom with permission from the Court.  Court reviews file.  Atty Firkus requesting to schedule a motion hearing.  Atty Firkus believes he can get motion filed in the next 2 weeks, court sets deadline for 7/15/22.  Court addresses parties.  DE to appear in person for next hearing. DE verified address and phone number.  Bond continues. Adjourned at 11:16 AM. bph  Motion hearing scheduled for August 4, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

ADA Rockow believes this case is moving towards resolution, requests additional PTC. Court sets PTC, Zoom approved if scheduling only. DE confirms address and phone number. Pretrial Violation Report - JSC. SEALED. km       to js
Clerk mailed to DE in Chisago County Jail. Pre-trial conference on May 13, 2022 at 10:00 am.

10:04 AM  Court Commissioner: Timothy C. Heckmann, Reporter: UNMONITORED DAR. Clerk: K. Anderson, ADA:  Brian Thomas Smestad appeared by video means, DF ATTY:  Dan Firkus appeared by video means, DF: Timothy John Rolow appeared by video means from Chisago County Jail. Atty. Firkus agrees to video appearance for today's hearing on behalf of DE. Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Waives reading. NG.  Waives speedy trial. Court sets PTC. Bond continues in form and amount. Clerk to mail Notice of Hearing to DE in Chisago County Jail. Adjourned: 10:07 AM. kma  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 13, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Arraignment on March 28, 2022 at 10:00 am.

09:33 AM  Crt Comm: Timothy C. Heckmann, RPR: Unmonitored DAR, Clk: Benoy  ADA:  Michael Joseph Becker   DF ATTY:  Dan Firkus appeared by video means for DF.  DF:  Timothy John Rolow did not appear.  Originally set for Arraignment.   DF is in custody in MN is unable to appear today.  Atty Firkus to look into zoom appearance for DF.  Arraignment scheduled for March 28, 2022 at 10:00 am.
re: clients whereabouts. Filed by Atty Firkus. km             to TCH
Atty Dan Firkus requesting to appear by Zoom for the ARGN scheduled for 2/28/22.   Zoom approved; JA notified Atty Firkus. mw
Filed by ADA Smestad. mw
Arraignment on February 28, 2022 at 09:30 am.

10:08 AM Court Commissioner: Tim Heckmann, Reporter: UNMONITORED DAR. Clerk: S. Fox, ADA: Francis D. Collins, DF ATTY:  Dan Firkus, DF:  Timothy John Rolow appeared from jail. ADA Collins states Def has posted bail for this case however, will appear at 1:00 pm for an extradition hearing. S/T Officer A Getty. Direct by ADA Collins. Cross by Atty Firkus.  Court finds probable cause that a felony was committed and the DF probably committed that felony and binds over for trial. Atty Firkus states Def may be incarcerated for 305 days in MN. ADA Collins requests to set ARGN for purposes of scheduling today. Court approves zoom appearance at the next hearing. for Atty Firkus and Def. Adjourned at 10:36 am.  Arraignment scheduled for February 28, 2022 at 09:30 am.

records.addlTxt: By Noah W - 22R 001129
Preliminary hearing on January 28, 2022 at 11:00 am.

for continuance of PH. Filed by PD's Office. km
Per SRN, Def is in custody - reset on or before 1/28 (10 days from IA on 1/18). JA rescheduled. js/km
Appointing Atty Firkus. km
Preliminary hearing on February 25, 2022 at 11:30 am.

Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant.

I understand that I must report to and comply with all terms, conditions, and protocols of the St. Croix County Justice Support Center. I further understand that I am required be fitted with a SCRAM alcohol testing unit and further understand I am to submit to random alcohol testing at least TWO times per day. Failure to report and/or comply with conditions and/or protocols may result in a report to the District Attorney's Office, an arrest warrant, and/or referral for criminal charges.

I understand that I must report to the Justice Support Center immediately. If after regular business hours I must call (715)245-4109 to schedule an appointment with the Justice Support Center by the end of the following business day.

01:59 PM Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: Melstrom, Clerk: Lindabaur. ADA: Bela Alexander Ballo DF ATTY: Jeremiah Harrelson and Kaitlin Dippolito for today  DF:  Timothy John Rolow appeared from jail. Defendant qualifies for PD. Court notes DE is on a probation hold. DE confirms address and DOB. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Waive reading. Bond argument; bond ordered. Court sets PH with Court Commissioner. Adjourned at 2:04 PM.  gll  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 25, 2022 at 11:30 am.
